#summary Here you can find all the custom filters and actions in use in the last version of the plugin

= Filters =

In this filters the post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization.

  * *ffff_post_title ($title, $post)*. Filter the title of the post
  * *ffff_post_content ($content, $post)*. Filter the content of the post
  * *ffff_transform_content ($content, $post)*. Filter the content of every single item
